name: Neverend Wonderland
description:
A ~11,000 word kinetic-novel that explores the classic story of "Alice in Wonderland" with minor twists and changes. Alice, a sickly man, falls into Wonderland one day, feeling abnormal. However, he tries to leave to return to his sister by following the White Rabbit. Can he leave?

CREDITS

Code/Character art by lessrattical

Story/BG by kannorii

Sound/Music: Pixabay

Kinetic Text by Wattson

WARNING

I have only tested this on Windows so I don't know if Mac will work properly ;;
also it's my first game jam/game made properly so if there are any bugs I apologize!! -lessrattical
